00026 FilesystemNode* LocalFolder::getChild(unsigned int n) {
00027         if (m_entryList.size() > n)
00028                 return m_entryList[n];
00029         else
00030                 return 0;
00031 }

00033 File* LocalFolder::newChild(string Name) {
00034 
00035         //If the name is invalid return 0
00036         if (Name.empty()) {
00037                 return 0;
00038         }
00039 
00040         //If it already exists bottle out return 0
00041         if (searchForChild(Name) != 0) {
00042                 return 0;
00043         }
00044 
00045         //Generate the file path
00046         string fullPath = m_localFolderPath + Name;
00047 
00048         File* newFile = new LocalFile(fullPath);
00049         m_entryList.push_back(newFile);
00050 
00051         return newFile;
00052 }

00054 Folder* LocalFolder::newChildFolder(string Name) {
00055 
00056         //If the name is invalid return 0
00057         if (Name.empty())
00058                 return 0;
00059 
00060         //If it already exists bottle out return 0
00061         if (searchForChild(Name) != 0)
00062                 return 0;
00063 
00064         Folder* returnFolder = 0;
00065 
00066         //Generate the file path
00067         string fullPath = m_localFolderPath + Name + "/";
00068 
00069         if (mkdir(fullPath.c_str(), 0) == 0) {
00070 
00071                 returnFolder = new LocalFolder(Name, fullPath);
00072                 returnFolder->refresh();
00073 
00074                 m_entryList.push_back(returnFolder);
00075         }
00076 
00077         return returnFolder;
00078 }

00080 void LocalFolder::refresh() {
00081 #warning May not be compatable with Windows 32
00082         emptyList();
00083 
00084         DIR* dir = opendir(m_localFolderPath.c_str());
00085         struct dirent* nextEntry;
00086 
00087         if (dir != 0) {
00088 
00089                 while (true) {
00090 
00091                         nextEntry = readdir(dir);
00092 
00093                         if (nextEntry != 0) {
00094                                 //Check it isn't the current or parent indicators
00095                                 if (strcmp(nextEntry->d_name, ".") == 0) {
00096                                         //Do nothing for this dir
00097                                 } else if (strcmp(nextEntry->d_name, "..") == 0) {
00098                                         //Do nothing for the dir the level above
00099                                 } else {
00100                                         //if its not process it
00101 
00102                                         if (nextEntry->d_type == DT_DIR) {
00103 
00104                                                 //Directory
00105                                                 string fullPath = m_localFolderPath + nextEntry->d_name
00106                                                                 + "/";
00107 
00108                                                 Folder* subFolder = new LocalFolder(nextEntry->d_name,
00109                                                                 fullPath);
00110 
00111                                                 subFolder->refresh();
00112 
00113                                                 m_entryList.push_back(subFolder);
00114 
00115                                         } else {
00116 
00117                                                 //File
00118                                                 string fullPath = m_localFolderPath + nextEntry->d_name;
00119 
00120                                                 m_entryList.push_back(new LocalFile(fullPath));
00121                                         }
00122 
00123                                 }
00124 
00125                         } else {
00126 
00127                                 break;
00128 
00129                         }
00130 
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 closedir(dir);
00134                 dir = 0;
00135         }
00136 
00137 }

00139 void LocalFolder::emptyList() {
00140 
00141         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_entryList.size(); ++i) {
00142                 delete m_entryList[i];
00143         }
00144 
00145         m_entryList.clear();
00146 
00147 }

00149 FilesystemNode* LocalFolder::searchForChild(std::string name) {
00150 
00151         printf("Search for %s\n", name.c_str());
00152 
00153         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_entryList.size(); ++i) {
00154 
00155                 if ( name.compare(m_entryList[i]->getName()) == 0) {
00156 
00157                         printf("Found\n");
00158 
00159                         return m_entryList[i];
00160 
00161                 }
00162 
00163         }
00164 
00165         printf("ERROR: Child not found\n");
